metadata.title: LLMFeedForge — Session Context Snapshot
metadata.description: Capture of ongoing session progress, remaining tasks, and system state.

context.goal: Finalize and deploy V2 spec, ecosystem tools, feed support and agent simulation

completed: ✅ Full walkthrough of spec V2 archive: feedtypes, extensions, agent-behavior, examples
✅ Prompt capsule page regenerated and integrated
✅ `/llmfeedhub/preview` rewritten to simulate both MCP + fallback view
✅ Components for FeedSummary, FallbackSummary, Simulator updated and working
✅ Scripts/README written for canonicalization, sign, verify
✅ Canonical JSON profile created for LLMCA
in_progress: ⚙️ Final linkage across site (ecosystem, tools, prompts)
remaining: 🛠 Clean audit of `/tools/` structure (possible collapse of subpages?)
🧪 Final testing of edge cases: sitemap analysis, fallback sites
🧾 Create FAQ as .llmfeed.json or structured `news` entry
📦 Regenerate final spec `.zip` + `.llmfeed.json` signed version for GitHub release
📢 Prepare coordinated announcement (HN + Medium + X + LinkedIn + OG)
🔐 Expose public key, signature manifest, validator for Forge/LLMCA
